message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'opennlp.tools.util.InvalidFormatException' import. Should be before 'org.junit.Test'.
Abbreviation in name 'POSSampleTest' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
Abbreviation in name 'testPOSSampleSerDe' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
Abbreviation in name 'deSerializedPOSSample' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
'+' should be on a new line.
